item.title: NAB 调查显示，澳大利亚商业状况为大流行病以来最差
item.description: 11 月份，由于制造业和零售业贸易条件严峻，信心指数急转直下，衡量澳大利亚商业活动的一项指标下滑至大流行病以来的最低点。【原文：A measure of Australian business activity slid to its lowest since the pandemic in November as confidence took a turn for the worse amid tough trading conditions in the manufacturing and retail sectors.】

item.title: 美国制裁目标包括斯里兰卡航空公司前首席执行官与空客的交易
item.description: 为纪念国际反腐败日和人权日前夕，美国国务院于周一宣布了一系列针对多个国家个人的制裁措施，其中包括斯里兰卡航空公司前首席执行官因购买空中客车而受到的制裁。【原文：The U.S. State Department announced a slew of sanctions on Monday to mark International Anti-Corruption Day and the eve of Human Rights Day, targeting individuals from multiple countries, including the former CEO of SriLankan Airlines over Airbus purchases.】

item.title: 受关税和罢工威胁影响，美国进口商将加速发货，达到创纪录水平
item.description: 全美零售联合会行业组织周一表示，美国繁忙的港口在 11 月和 12 月的活动将更上一层楼，届时入境货运量将创下新纪录。【原文：The United States' busy ports kicked activity up a notch in November and December, when inbound cargo traffic is set to reach new records, the National Retail Federation industry group said on Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行决定对华政策转变引发争论
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 企业人工智能软件需求强劲，C3.ai上调年度预期
item.description: C3.ai公司周一上调了2025财年的收入预期，这主要得益于企业对其企业人工智能软件的强劲需求，因为企业正在寻找能帮助简化工作流程的工具。【原文：C3.ai raised its forecast for fiscal year 2025 revenue on Monday, helped by healthy demand for the company's enterprise artificial intelligence software as companies look for tools to help streamline their workflow.】

item.title: 贸易组织称，油田服务公司 11 月新增更多工作岗位
item.description: 据行业组织能源劳动力与技术理事会周一公布的数据，油田服务公司在 11 月份加大了招聘力度，为该行业增加了 1,890 个工作岗位。【原文：Oilfield service companies ramped up hiring in November, adding 1,890 jobs in the sector, according to data from trade group Energy Workforce & Technology Council released on Monday.】

item.title: 为帮助虐待幸存者，拜登监督机构启动规则制定工作
item.description: 美国消费者金融监督机构周一宣布启动保护家庭暴力和虐待老人受害者的规则制定程序，称遭受此类虐待的人可能会被胁迫举债或开设银行账户。【原文：The U.S. watchdog for consumer finance on Monday announced the start of the rulemaking process to protect victims of domestic violence and elder abuse, saying those who suffer such mistreatment can be coerced into taking on debt or opening bank accounts.】

item.title: 比特币下跌 5%，至 95,519 美元
item.description: 比特币是世界上最大、最知名的加密货币，格林尼治标准时间周一21:03，比特币下跌5%，至95,519美元。【原文：Bitcoin, the world's biggest and best-known cryptocurrency, fell 5% to $95,519 at 2103 GMT on Monday.】

item.title: 康德摩根预计 2025 年利润将增加
item.description: 金德摩根公司周一预测 2025 年盈利将有所增长，因为在燃料需求不断增长的情况下，这家美国管道运营商押注于其天然气管道和能源转型企业的增长。【原文：Kinder Morgan forecast higher earnings in 2025 on Monday, as the U.S. pipeline operator bets on growth in its natural gas pipelines and energy transition ventures amid rising demand for the fuel.】

item.title: 甲骨文第二季度营收不及预期
item.description: 甲骨文公司周一公布的第二季度营收不及华尔街预期，原因是企业客户在经济不确定的情况下削减预算，导致数据库和云服务支出疲软，甲骨文股价在盘后交易中下跌超过 9%。【原文：Oracle missed Wall Street expectations for second-quarter revenue on Monday, hit by softer spending on its database and cloud services as enterprise clients slash budgets amid an uncertain economy, sending its shares down over 9% in extended trading.】

item.title: 纽约时报》报道：鲁珀特-默多克试图改变家族信托失败
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周一援引一份密封的法庭文件报道，内华达州一名专员拒绝了鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）改变其家族信托，将其媒体帝国的控制权集中在儿子拉克兰（Lachlan）手中的要求。【原文：A Nevada commissioner has rejected Rupert Murdoch's bid to change his family trust to consolidate control of his media empire in the hands of his son Lachlan, the New York Times reported on Monday, citing a sealed court document.】

item.title: EIA 称，加利福尼亚州的法律和炼油厂的退出反映了燃料市场面临的持续挑战
item.description: 美国能源信息署（EIA）周一表示，随着新立法的生效和炼油利润的持续疲软，加州的燃料制造商明年可能会面临更多的不利因素。【原文：Fuelmakers in California could face more headwinds next year as new legislation takes effect and refining margins remain weak, the U.S. Energy Information Administration (EIA) said on Monday.】

item.title: 安联希望将四分之三的利润重新分配给股东
item.description: 德国安联（Allianz）公司周一表示，计划在未来三年内通过分红和股票回购将至少四分之三的净利润分配给股东。【原文：Germany's Allianz said on Monday it plans to distribute at least three-quarters of its net profit to shareholders via dividends and share buybacks over the next three years.】

item.title: OpenAI 面向 ChatGPT Plus 和 Pro 用户发布文本到视频模型 Sora
item.description: OpenAI 周一表示，它已向 ChatGPT Plus 和 Pro 用户发布了可从文本创建视频的人工智能模型，从而扩大了其在多模态人工智能技术领域的尝试。【原文：OpenAI said on Monday it has released its artificial intelligence model, which creates video from text, to ChatGPT Plus and Pro users, expanding its foray into multimodal AI technologies.】

item.title: 根据拟议法案，大疆可能被禁止在美国推出新产品
item.description: 美国国会众议院将于本周晚些时候对一项年度军事法案进行投票表决，根据该法案，总部位于中国的大疆可能被禁止在美国市场推出新的无人机。【原文：China-based DJI could be banned from launching new drones in the United States market under an annual military bill set to be voted on later this week by the U.S. House.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 研究员融资 4000 万美元，打造更具同理心的音频人工智能
item.description: 本周一，OpenAI 的一位前研究员为一家初创公司融资 4000 万美元，该公司将建立人工智能模型，通过语音与人类进行情感交流。【原文：A former OpenAI researcher has raised $40 million for a startup that will build artificial-intelligence models that connect emotionally with humans via voice, the company said on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，纽蒙特公司裁员近十名经理，计划合并业务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引知情人士的话报道，黄金矿商纽蒙特公司（Newmont）解雇了近十名管理人员，其中包括一名执行团队成员，作为公司整顿的一部分。【原文：Gold miner Newmont let go of nearly a dozen managers, including a member of its executive team, as part of a corporate overhaul, Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志银行：特斯拉旨在推出配备远程驾驶员的机器人出租车
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）在与特斯拉公司投资者关系负责人会面后发表的一份报告中表示，特斯拉的目标是通过一支由公司所有的车队提供机器人出租车服务，并由人类远程操作员提供安全支持。【原文：Tesla aims to start its robotaxi service with a company-owned fleet backed up by human teleoperators for safety, Deutsche Bank said in a note after a meeting with the company's head of investor relations.】

item.title: 花旗集团与华尔街同行共同预测美联储 12 月降息 25 个基点
item.description: 花旗集团此前是华尔街唯一一家预测美国联邦储备委员会将降息 50 个基点的券商，现在它与其他券商一样，预计美国联邦储备委员会将在 12 月份的政策会议上降息四分之一个基点。【原文：Citigroup, previously the only Wall Street brokerage forecasting a 50 basis point rate cut by the U.S. Federal Reserve, has now aligned with its peers in expecting a quarter point reduction at the central bank's December policy meeting.】

item.title: 首席执行官邓称，Binance 仍在为全球总部选址
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Binance 的首席执行官周一告诉路透社，Binance 尚未决定将其全球总部设在哪里，而在此之前，Binance 曾表示即将做出决定，但这位高管指出，Binance 已经采取了一些措施来改善公司治理。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Binance has yet to decide where to base its global headquarters, its CEO told Reuters on Monday, years after it flagged a decision was imminent, but the executive pointed to moves it has made to improve corporate governance.】

item.title: 意大利就 Facebook 所有者涉嫌逃税 9.38 亿美元一事对 Meta 两名高管展开调查
item.description: 意大利米兰检察官办公室周一表示，意大利检察官已完成对 Facebook 母公司 Meta 涉嫌逃税 8.876 亿欧元（约合 9.3793 亿美元）的调查，其中涉及其爱尔兰部门的两名高管。【原文：Italian prosecutors have wrapped up a probe into alleged tax evasion of 887.6 million euros ($937.93 million) by Facebook parent company Meta involving two executives of its Irish unit, the Milan prosecutor's office said on Monday.】

item.title: 文件显示，法国农业信贷银行可能在未来 6 个月内增持 Banco BPM 股份，但不会寻求控制权
item.description: 周一的一份文件显示，法国农业信贷银行可能在未来六个月内将其在 Banco BPM 的持股比例提高到 15%以上，一旦获得监管部门的批准，它将通过衍生工具收购，但不会寻求控制这家意大利银行，持股比例也不会超过 19.99%。【原文：Credit Agricole could raise its stake in Banco BPM in the next six months above the 15% threshold it will acquire through derivatives once it has supervisory approval, won't seek control of the Italian bank or go above 19.99%, a filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美国将于 1 月 9 日提供阿拉斯加野生动物保护区的石油和天然气租约
item.description: 美国内政部周一表示，拜登政府将于 1 月 9 日出售阿拉斯加北极国家野生动物保护区的石油和天然气钻探租约。【原文：The Biden administration will offer oil and gas drilling leases in Alaska's Arctic National Wildlife Refuge at a sale on Jan. 9, the U.S. Interior Department said on Monday.】

item.title: TikTok 在最高法院上诉前聘请前特朗普政府律师
item.description: TikTok 和它的中国所有者字节跳动（ByteDance）已经求助于美国最高法院的一位资深律师，准备请求大法官阻止一项可能在美国禁止这一流行短视频平台的法律。【原文：TikTok and its Chinese owner ByteDance have turned to a veteran U.S. Supreme Court lawyer as they prepare to ask the justices to block a law that could ban the popular short video platform in the United States.】

item.title: 美国平均汽油价格自 2021 年以来首次降至每加仑 3 美元以下
item.description: 本周一，美国汽油平均价格在三年多的时间里首次跌破每加仑 3 美元，使近年来面临通胀飙升的消费者在加油时享受到的低价优惠得以延续。【原文：Average U.S. gasoline prices fell below $3 a gallon for the first time in over three years on Monday, extending a run of bargains at the pump for consumers who have faced soaring inflation in recent years.】

item.title: Vanguard 计划成立新的咨询和财富管理部门
item.description: 货币管理公司先锋（Vanguard）周一表示，将成立一个新的咨询和财富管理部门，由业内资深人士乔安娜-罗滕伯格（Joanna Rotenberg）领导。【原文：Money manager Vanguard said on Monday it will establish a new advice and wealth management division led by industry veteran Joanna Rotenberg.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特前拉姆主管重返品牌运营岗位
item.description: 在首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）意外辞职后，这家汽车制造商正寻求加强其领导团队。【原文：Stellantis' former head of Ram is returning to the company just months after announcing his retirement, as the automaker seeks to strengthen its leadership team following the unexpected resignation of CEO Carlos Tavares.】

item.title: WARN 通知显示波音将在华盛顿州裁员近 400 人
item.description: 周一的一份工人调整和再培训通知显示，波音公司将在华盛顿州的多个地点裁员约 396 人。【原文：Boeing is laying off about 396 employees at various locations in Washington State, a worker adjustment and retraining notification showed on Monday.】

item.title: 债券义警 "PIMCO减持长期美国主权债务
item.description: PIMCO 周一表示，计划通过在美国以外地区买入政府债券来分散政府债券风险，由于美国财政状况恶化，PIMCO 看空美国长期国债前景。【原文：PIMCO said on Monday it plans to diversify its government bond exposure by buying outside the United States, where its outlook on long-term government debt is bearish due to a deteriorating fiscal profile.】

item.title: 纽约联储称，美国消费者预期通胀上升、经济改善
item.description: 纽约联邦储备委员会周一发布报告称，美国消费者上个月对未来几年通胀水平的上升做好了准备，尽管他们对个人财务状况将明显改善的预期有所提高。【原文：U.S. consumers were bracing last month for higher levels of inflation in coming years even as they marked up expectations that their personal financial situations would improve markedly, the New York Federal Reserve reported on Monday.】
